Notes.Text:
This update for gimp fixes the following issue:

- CVE-2017-17787: Fixed an out-of-bounds read in the PSP importer (bsc#1073628).

Vulnerabilities.Description: In GIMP 2.8.22, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in read_creator_block in plug-ins/common/file-psp.c.
